nodes.text: Bucco bread was a type of bread found on the agriworld Sedri Minor. It took the form of brown loaves. During the High Republic Era, Jedi Knight Keeve Trennis, while on the planet investigating the disappearance of a fellow Jedi, was offered fresh-baked bucco bread by Bartol and a Gran friend of his. Trennis politely turned the children down as the Jedi already had their own food, but was further offered samana spiced loaf by a Rodian couple.
